lcSingleSelect.lcQuestion: When a referencing element and the referenced element in a conref both use attributes: (choose one)

lcAnswerOption.lcAnswerContent: The attributes of the referencing element take precedence, except for -dita-use-conref-target and xml:lang.
The attributes of the referenced element take precedence, except for -dita-use-conref-target and xml:lang.
The attributes of the referencing element take precedence, no matter what.
The attributes of the referenced element take precedence, no matter what.

lcSingleSelect.lcFeedbackIncorrect: When resolving a conref, the attributes of the referencing element take precedence, except for -dita-use-conref-target and xml:lang.
